methods.description: Extra information about the wallet.
Opens the wallet at the given path

parameters.description: the full path and filename of the wallet to open

methods.description: Opens the wallet of the given name

parameters.name: wallet_name
parameters.description: the name of the wallet to open

methods.description: Creates a wallet with the given name

parameters.name: wallet_name
parameters.description: name of the wallet to create

parameters.name: new_passphrase
parameters.description: a passphrase for encrypting the wallet

parameters.name: brain_key
parameters.description: a strong passphrase that will be used to generate all private keys, defaults to a large random number

methods.description: Returns the wallet name passed to wallet_open
Loads the private key into the specified account

parameters.name: wif_key
parameters.description: A private key in bitcoin Wallet Import Format (WIF)

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: the name of the account the key should be imported into, if null then the key must belong to an active account

parameters.name: create_new_account
parameters.description: If true, the wallet will attempt to create a new account for the name provided rather than import the key into an existing account

parameters.name: rescan
parameters.description: If true, the wallet will rescan the blockchain looking for transactions that involve this private key

methods.description: Imports a bitcoin wallet

parameters.name: wallet_filename
parameters.description: the path to the bitcoin wallet you would like to import.

parameters.name: passphrase
parameters.description: the bitcoin wallet's password, not your bitshares wallet password.

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: the account name to receive the contents of the wallet, you must create this account first if it does not exist.

parameters.description: middle name in keyhotee profile config, for salting the seed of private key

parameters.name: lastname
parameters.description: last name in keyhotee profile config, for salting the seed of private key

parameters.name: brainkey
parameters.description: brainkey in keyhotee profile config, for salting the seed of private key

parameters.name: keyhoteeid
parameters.description: using keyhotee id as account name

methods.description: Sends given amount to the given address, assumes shares in DAC.  This transfer will occur using multiple transactions as necessary to maximize your privacy, but will be more costly.

parameters.name: amount_to_transfer
parameters.description: the amount of shares to transfer, will be multiplied by the precision associated by asset_symbol

parameters.name: asset_symbol
parameters.description: the asset to transfer

parameters.name: from_account_name
parameters.description: the source account(s) to draw the shares from

parameters.name: to_account_name
parameters.description: the account to transfer the shares to

parameters.name: memo_message
parameters.description: a memo to store with the transaction

methods.description: Sends given amount to the given address, assumes shares in DAC.  This transfer will occur in a single transaction and will be cheaper, but may reduce your privacy.

parameters.name: amount_to_transfer
parameters.description: the amount of shares to transfer

parameters.name: asset_symbol
parameters.description: the asset to transfer

parameters.name: from_account_name
parameters.description: the source account(s) to draw the shares from

parameters.name: to_account_name
parameters.description: the account to transfer the shares to

parameters.name: memo_message
parameters.description: a memo to store with the transaction

methods.description: Scans the transaction history for operations relevant to this wallet.

parameters.description: the first block to scan

methods.description: Creates a new user issued asset

parameters.description: the ticker symbol for the new asset

parameters.name: asset_name
parameters.description: the name of the asset

parameters.name: issuer_name
parameters.description: the name of the issuer of the asset

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: a description of the asset

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: arbitrary data attached to the asset

parameters.name: maximum_share_supply
parameters.description: the maximum number of shares of the asset

parameters.name: precision
parameters.description: defines where the decimal should be displayed, must be a power of 10
